```css
// Property: hidesBackButton
// Description: Set this to true to hide the back button of navigation bar.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window, Ti.UI.iOS.SplitWindow
'.hides-back-button': { hidesBackButton: true }
'.hides-back-button-false': { hidesBackButton: false }
```
